//Hole den Wert eines Cookies nach Name
const getCookie = async cname => {
    const name = cname + "=";
    const decodedCookie = decodeURIComponent(document.cookie);
    const ca = decodedCookie.split(';');
    for (let i = 0; i < ca.length; i++) {
        let c = ca[i];
        while (c.charAt(0) == ' ') {
            c = c.substring(1);
        }
        if (c.indexOf(name) == 0) {
            return c.substring(name.length, c.length);
        }
    }
    return "";
}
//Setzt einen Cookie, falls dieser noch nicht existiert. Falls doch, gebe false zurück
const setCookie = async(cname, cvalue, exdays) => {
    var d = new Date();
    d.setTime(d.getTime() + (exdays * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000));
    var expires = "expires=" + d.toUTCString();
    if (await getCookie(cname) !== "") return false;
    document.cookie = cname + "=" + cvalue + ";" + expires + ";path=/";
return true;
}
//Löscht einen Cookie
const deleteCookie = cname => {
    document.cookie = cname + "=; expires=Thu, 01 Jan 1970 00:00:00 UTC; path=/;";
}

<script>
(function () {
function changeLanguage(language) {
var xmlhttp = new XMLHttpRequest();
xmlhttp.onreadystatechange = function () {
if (xmlhttp.readyState === XMLHttpRequest.DONE) {
if (xmlhttp.status === 200) {
if (window.Putzmeister && typeof window.Putzmeister.urlRedirectionCallback === 'function' && Liferay.ThemeDisplay.getCanonicalURL().includes(Liferay.ThemeDisplay.getPortalURL())) {
/* we have a valid callback -> call it */
window.Putzmeister.urlRedirectionCallback();
} else {
/* we don't have a valid callback -> fallback to simple refresh */
window.location.reload();
}
} else {
console.log(
'Could not update the language: ' + xmlhttp.statusText + '(HTTP status code ' +
xmlhttp.status +
')');
}
}
};
var url = document.getElementById('mpmUrl').value;
var redirect = document.getElementById('mpmRedirect').value;
url = url + language + redirect;
xmlhttp.open("GET", url, true);
xmlhttp.send();
}
var langList = document.getElementsByClassName('mpmLanguageSelectorItem');
for (var i = 0; i < langList.length; i++) {
var lang = langList[i];
lang.addEventListener('click', function () {
changeLanguage(this.dataset.value);
});
}
})();
</script>

                    <div class="p-card__body">

                                <i class="pm-icon-arrow-right-circle text--putzmeister-yellow"></i> Underground concreting in an anhydrite mine with the Putzmeister P 720 TD double-piston pump
                            </a>
                        </div>
                        <div class="p-card__body-content truncate-3l" style="">In Liebenau in the German state of Hesse, a new crushing and conveying plant is currently being set up in the Knauf anhydrite mine.</div>
                    </div>

                    </div>

                    <div class="p-card__body">
                        <div class="p-card__body-heading text-truncate">
                            <a href="/web/european-union/success-story-detail/-/asset_publisher/bottom-ash-safe-and-efficient-handling?redirect=/web/european-union">
                                <i class="pm-icon-arrow-right-circle text--putzmeister-yellow"></i> Bottom ash - safe and efficient handling
                            </a>
                        </div>
                        <div class="p-card__body-content truncate-3l" style="">In December 2008, a devastating environmental disaster occurred in Kinston, Tennessee.
The dam of a reservoir, which for years absorbed ash from the local coal-fired power station, ruptured under the load. Millions of cubic metres of black sludge poured over the region like a tidal wave, destroying houses and turning once-thriving local rivers into dead zones for fish.
This<span class="js-shave-char">…</span><span class="js-shave" style="display: none;"> shocking event drew attention to the dangers of storing ash with a high water content and sparked an urgent discussion about safety and environmental protection.</span></div>

				//Hole den Wert eines Cookies nach Name
const getCountryCookie = async cname => {
    const name = cname + "=";
    const decodedCookie = decodeURIComponent(document.cookie);
    const ca = decodedCookie.split(';');
    for (let i = 0; i < ca.length; i++) {
        let c = ca[i];
        while (c.charAt(0) == ' ') {
            c = c.substring(1);
        }
        if (c.indexOf(name) == 0) {
            return c.substring(name.length, c.length);
        }
    }
    return "";
}

//Setzt einen Cookie, falls dieser noch nicht existiert. Falls doch, gebe false zurück
const setCountryCookie = async(cname, cvalue, exdays) => {
    var d = new Date();
    d.setTime(d.getTime() + (exdays * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000));
    var expires = "expires=" + d.toUTCString();
    if (await getCountryCookie(cname) !== "") return false;
    document.cookie = cname + "=" + cvalue + ";" + expires + ";path=/";
return true;
}


//Löscht einen Cookie
const deleteCookie = cname => {
    document.cookie = cname + "=; expires=Thu, 01 Jan 1970 00:00:00 UTC; path=/;";
}

setCountryCookie("mpm_category_country_id","35978",365);
setCountryCookie("mpm_country_code","DE",365);
			
		// ]]>
	</script>

News

Putzmeister at Asia's leading Trade Fair for Environmental Technology Solution!
Federal Minister Klara Geywitz's visit to INSTATIQ at BAUMA 2025 highlights the growing importance of automation and robotics for the future of construction. The focus was on the enormous potential of 3D concrete printing to accelerate construction processes, the use of this technology as a solution to the shortage of skilled workers, and the need for more efficient approval… procedures.
Premiere: the first fully electric iONTRON truck-mounted concrete pump with Volvo eTrucks
View All

Success Stories

In Liebenau in the German state of Hesse, a new crushing and conveying plant is currently being set up in the Knauf anhydrite mine.
In December 2008, a devastating environmental disaster occurred in Kinston, Tennessee. The dam of a reservoir, which for years absorbed ash from the local coal-fired power station, ruptured under the load. Millions of cubic metres of black sludge poured over the region like a tidal wave, destroying houses and turning once-thriving local rivers into dead zones for fish. This shocking event drew attention to the dangers of storing ash with a high water content and sparked an urgent discussion about safety and environmental protection.
Tratolixo, Portugal’s largest waste management company, already had two Putzmeister lines and is now adding a third to increase production and as a back-up option.

metadata.title: Home | MyPutzmeister
metadata.description: We have been global leaders in the world of construction and mining since 1958. We develop, produce, sell and serve our customers with high quality and high reliability machines for pumping, distributing and placing concrete, mortar and high-density solids, and for preparing, temporarily storing, processing and transporting these materials.
